MESSAGE.THEME_ALREADY_EXISTS: A Theme with that name already exists
MESSAGE.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Theme was not created.

DELETE.LABEL: Delete
DELETE.THEME_MESSAGE: Do you want to delete this Theme?
DELETE.MESSAGE_REJECT: The Theme is marked as required for operation and therefore cannot be deleted.

MESSAGE.CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Theme was not changed.
MESSAGE.IMAGE_CONSTRAINT: An error has occurred. Please add a Theme name before uploading a file.
MESSAGE.IMAGE_CONSTRAINT_SIZE: An error has occurred. The image is too large.

EXPORT.LABEL: Export
EXPORT.EXPORT_THEME_FAIL: An error occurred, the Theme was not exported.

INTERNAL.OPERATOR_MESSAGE: This Theme was created by automation. All changes will be lost during the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: Name of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: Name of the user of the last change
TOOLTIPS.MANDATORY: If set then this Theme is necessary for operation and therefore the Theme cannot be deleted.
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Theme cannot be deleted and all changes will be lost during the next deployment.

IMAGE.UPLOAD_FAIL: The file was not uploaded successfully
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_FILE_TYPE: The following image formats are accepted: jpg, jpeg, png
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME: Please add a Workspace name before uploading a file.
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_SIZE: The image file size exceeds the maximum length of 100,000 bytes.

TOOLTIPS.URL: As an alternative to uploading, a URL to an image can be specified here

THEME.DETAIL.AUTO_APPLY.TOOLTIP: If this option is switched on, then all changes (font, colors) are automatically applied to the current page.
THEME.DETAIL.AUTO_APPLY_CURRENT_THEME: Changes are applied immediately when saving because it is the Theme currently in use

TABS.USE_TOOLTIP: List of Workspaces using the Theme

IMPORT.IMPORT_THEME_FAIL: An error occurred, the Theme was not imported.
IMPORT.NAME_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Theme with this name already exists. Its definition is overwritten.
IMPORT.DISPLAY_NAME_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Theme with this display name already exists.

TEMPLATE.SELECTOR.TOOLTIP: Choose an existing Theme and use it as a template
TEMPLATE.CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE: Should all values be replaced by the values of "{{ITEM}}"?

THEME.NAME: Name

TOOLTIPS.ID: Unique technical ID of the Theme
TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique name of the Theme, cannot be changed. Used as reference to the Theme.
TOOLTIPS.ITEM_COLOR_PICKER: Select a color with the color picker
TOOLTIPS.MANDATORY: The Theme is required for operation.

ERRORS.FORM_INVALID: The form data are not ready to save the Theme.
ERRORS.PARSE_ERROR: Parse error: The contained structure does not match the expected format.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: Your input does not match the required pattern
ERRORS.FILETYPE_PATTERN_ERROR_1: Your file does not match the allowed filetype: .ico
ERRORS.FILETYPE_PATTERN_ERROR_2: Your file does not match the allowed filetypes: .png, .jpg, .jpeg

HTTP_STATUS_0.MENUS: Unknown problem retrieving Theme data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_401.MENUS: You are not authorized to see Themes.

HTTP_STATUS_403.MENUS: You have no permissions to see Themes.

HTTP_STATUS_500.MENUS: Unknown server problem retrieving the Theme - please try again.
